subject: Madrid Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: After Grigor Dimitrov upset the world’s No. 1 player, Novak Djokovic, at the Madrid Open, he tried to downplay the significance of it.
snippet: After Grigor Dimitrov upset the world’s No. 1 player, Novak Djokovic, at the Madrid Open, he tried to downplay the significance of it.
